sn6.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn6.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bakassa brahmuno evarupam papakam ditthigatam uppannam hoti:
sn6.4:1.4: “idam niccam, idam dhuvam, idam sassatam, idam kevalam, idam acavanadhammam, idanhi na jayati na jiyati na miyati na cavati na upapajjati, ito ca panannam uttari nissaranam natthi”ti.
sn6.4:2.1: Atha kho bhagava bakassa brahmuno cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—jetavane antarahito tasmim brahmaloke paturahosi.
sn6.4:2.2: Addasa kho bako brahma bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
sn6.4:2.5: Cirassam kho, marisa, imam pariyayamakasi yadidam idhagamanaya.
sn6.4:2.6: Idanhi, marisa, niccam, idam dhuvam, idam sassatam, idam kevalam, idam acavanadhammam, idanhi na jayati na jiyati na miyati na cavati na upapajjati. Ito ca panannam uttari nissaranam natthi”ti.
sn6.4:3.1: Evam vutte, bhagava bakam brahmanam etadavoca:
sn6.4:3.2: “avijjagato vata bho bako brahma, avijjagato vata bho bako brahma.
sn6.4:3.3: Yatra hi nama aniccamyeva samanam niccanti vakkhati, adhuvamyeva samanam dhuvanti vakkhati, asassatamyeva samanam sassatanti vakkhati, akevalamyeva samanam kevalanti vakkhati, cavanadhammamyeva samanam acavanadhammanti vakkhati.
sn6.4:3.4: Yattha ca pana jayati ca jiyati ca miyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca, tanca tatha vakkhati:
sn6.4:3.5: ‘idanhi na jayati na jiyati na miyati na cavati na upapajjati’.
sn6.4:3.6: Santanca panannam uttari nissaranam, ‘natthannam uttari nissaranan’ti vakkhati”ti.
